folder: Richmond Terrace & Broadway, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Terrace, east from Broadway.

November 4, 1931

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Broadway

folder: Richmond Terrace & Broadway, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Terrace, south side, west of Broadway, showing an old dwelling about 125 feet south of the street. A narrow lane, situated between numbers 1516 and 1520 Richmond Terrace, leads to the house.

July 5, 1932

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Broadway
